mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders o,business b,member m,`comment` c WHERE o.business_id = b.id AND o.member_id = m.id AND o.id = c.orders_id AND o.people_number = #{peopleNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business( business_id, member_id, people_number, comment_state, price, create_time) VALUES( #{businessId}, #{memberId}, #{peopleNumber}, #{commentState}, #{price}, #{createTime});
